meanings.definition: The act of removing feminine qualities or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: Her defeminizations were evident in her choice of clothing and behavior.
meanings.sent2: The defeminizations in the movie industry have sparked debates about gender representation.
meanings.sent3: The defeminizations in the play added a unique twist to the traditional storyline.
meanings.sent4: Her defeminizations were like peeling layers of an onion, revealing a different side of her.
meanings.sent5: The defeminizations in the painting were so striking that they challenged societal norms.

meanings.definition: The process of making something less feminine.
meanings.sent1: The defeminizations of the room involved removing all floral decorations.
meanings.sent2: She observed the defeminizations of the language used in the advertisement.
meanings.sent3: The defeminizations of the cake design made it look more modern and sleek.
meanings.sent4: The defeminizations of the music transformed it into a more neutral sound.
meanings.sent5: His defeminizations of the outfit gave it a more androgynous appeal.

meanings.definition: The state of being stripped of feminine attributes.
meanings.sent1: After the defeminizations, she felt liberated from societal expectations.
meanings.sent2: The defeminizations of the character made her more relatable to a wider audience.
meanings.sent3: The defeminizations of the room decor created a minimalist and clean aesthetic.
meanings.sent4: His defeminizations of the script brought a fresh perspective to the story.
meanings.sent5: The defeminizations of the garden revealed its true beauty in a new light.
